animations.name: slideIn
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
animations.content: This is a slide-in animation

animations.name: slideInLeftFade
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the left and fades in.

animations.name: slideUpFadeScale
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(100%) scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateY(-10px) scale(1.1); opacity: 0.5; } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the bottom, scales, and fades in.

animations.name: slideRightFadeScale
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(100%) scale(0.5); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the right with scaling and fading.

animations.name: scaleDownFadeOutSlideDown
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateY(20px) scale(0.8); opacity: 0.5; } 100% { transform: translateY(100%) scale(0.5); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation scales down, fades, and slides out downward.

animations.name: scaleUpFadeInSlideUp
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(100%) scale(0.5); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation slides up, scales up, and fades in.

animations.name: slideInFromTopFadeScale
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(-100%) scale(0.8); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the top with scaling and fading.

animations.name: scaleBounceFadeOutSlideDown
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateY(-15px) scale(1.1); opacity: 0.7; } 100% { transform: translateY(100%) scale(0.7); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation bounces up, fades, and slides down with scaling.

animations.name: slideRightScaleFadeInOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(100%) scale(0.5); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1.1); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: translateX(-100%) scale(0.7); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the right, scales up, and slides out to the left.

animations.name: slideLeftFadeScaleBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%) scale(0.7); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1.1); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateX(100%) scale(0.8); opacity: 0.5; }
animations.content: This animation slides in from the left, bounces, scales, and fades.

animations.name: scaleFadeSlideOutDown
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1) translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 30% { transform: scale(0.7) translateY(0); opacity: 0.7; } 100% { transform: scale(0.5) translateY(300%); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This is an animation where the element scales down, fades, and slides out downward.

animations.name: scaleFadeSlideInUp
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0.5) translateY(300%); opacity: 0; } 30% { transform: scale(0.7) translateY(0); opacity: 0.7; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This is an animation where the element scales up, fades in, and slides in from below.

animations.name: slideOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 100% { transform: translateX(100%); }
animations.content: This is a slide-out animation

animations.name: slideUp
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(100%); } 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
animations.content: This is a slide-up animation

animations.name: slideDown
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 100% { transform: translateY(100%); }
animations.content: This is a slide-down animation

animations.name: slideInFromTopExpand
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(-200%) scaleY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-50) scaleY(.5); } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scaleY(1); }
animations.content: This is a slide-in from the top with expansion animation

animations.name: slideInFromLeftExpand
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%) scaleX(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-50) scaleX(.5); } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scaleY(1); }
animations.content: This is a slide-in from the left with expansion animation

animations.name: slideDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translate(-100%, 100%); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
animations.content: This is a diagonal slide animation

animations.name: slideAndFade
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation combines sliding and fading

animations.name: slideBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); } 70% { transform: translateX(10%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
animations.content: This animation adds a bounce effect to the slide

animations.name: slideZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%) scale(0.5); } 100% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation combines sliding with a zoom effect

animations.name: slideInSlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); } 80% { transform: translateX(5%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
animations.content: This is a slow slide-in animation with a smooth finish

animations.name: slideInSpin
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(-100%) rotate(-180deg); } 100% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation combines sliding with a spin effect

animations.name: bounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-30px); } 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
animations.content: This is a bouncing animation

animations.name: bounceUp
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 30% { transform: translateY(-40px); } 50% { transform: translateY(0); } 100% { transform: translateY(-20px); }
animations.content: This is an upward bounce animation

animations.name: bounceHorizontal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 50% { transform: translateX(30px); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
animations.content: This animation creates a horizontal bouncing effect

animations.name: bounceRotate
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); } 50% { transform: translateY(-30px) rotate(15deg); } 100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation bounces with a slight rotation

animations.name: bounceStretch
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scaleY(1); } 50% { transform: scaleY(0.8); } 100% { transform: scaleY(1); }
animations.content: This animation creates a squishy bounce effect

animations.name: bounceDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 50% { transform: translate(30px, -30px); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
animations.content: This animation bounces diagonally

animations.name: bouncePulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px) scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation combines bouncing with pulsing

animations.name: bounceRandom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); } 25% { transform: translate(-20px, -20px); } 50% { transform: translate(30px, 20px); } 75% { transform: translate(-15px, 10px); } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); }
animations.content: This animation bounces in random directions

animations.name: fadeIn
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; } 100% { opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This is a fade-in animation

animations.name: fadeOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This is a fade-out animation

animations.name: fadeInOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; } 50% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This is a fade-in and fade-out loop animation

animations.name: fadeSlideUp
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
animations.content: This animation fades in while sliding up

animations.name: fadeSlideDown
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
animations.content: This animation fades in while sliding down

animations.name: fadeRotate
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; transform: rotate(-15deg); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation fades in with a subtle rotation

animations.name: fadeZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation fades in with a slight zoom effect

animations.name: fadeBlink
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0; } 100% { opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation creates a blinking fade effect

animations.name: fadeDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-20px, 20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translate(0, 0); }
animations.content: This animation fades in while moving diagonally

animations.name: zoomIn
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This is a zoom-in animation

animations.name: zoomOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); } 100% { transform: scale(0); }
animations.content: This is a zoom-out animation

animations.name: zoomBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); } 70% { transform: scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a bouncing effect

animations.name: zoomPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation creates a pulsating zoom effect

animations.name: zoomTwist
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotate(0deg); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotate(90deg); } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a twist

animations.name: planeZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scaleX(0) scaleY(0); } 50% { transform: scaleX(1.5) scaleY(2); } 100% { transform: scaleX(1) scaleY(1); }
animations.content: This is a zoom-in vertically and horizontally

animations.name: zoomFlash
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a flash effect

animations.name: zoomWobble
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); } 25% { transform: scale(1.2) rotate(5deg); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotate(-5deg); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation zooms and wobbles simultaneously

animations.name: zoom3D
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotateX(90deg) rotateY(90deg); } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a 3D rotation

animations.name: zoomElastic
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); } 40% { transform: scale(1.2); } 60% { transform: scale(0.8); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with an elastic effect

animations.name: zoomInBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } 30% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a bounce effect.

animations.name: zoomOutElastic
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 40% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 1; } 60% { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation zooms out with an elastic effect and fades away.

animations.name: zoomInWithShadow
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; box-shadow: 0 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a shadow effect.

animations.name: zoomRotateIn
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotate(360deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in while rotating 360 degrees.

animations.name: zoomFlip
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotateY(180deg); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotateY(0deg); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotateY(0deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in and flips around the Y-axis.

animations.name: zoomPerspective3D
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotateX(45deg) rotateY(45deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a 3D perspective effect.

animations.name: zoomInWave
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotate(10deg); opacity: 0.6; } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotate(-10deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a waving effect and fades in.

animations.name: zoomStaggered
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } 25% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 0.3; } 50% { transform: scale(1) rotate(15deg); opacity: 0.6; } 75% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 0.9; } 100% { transform: scale(1) opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with staggered scaling and opacity changes.

animations.name: zoomInAndFlipOut
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.5) rotate(180deg); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(0) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in and flips out with a 360-degree rotation.

animations.name: zoomOutPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
animations.content: This animation zooms out with a pulsing effect.

animations.name: zoom3DCenterExpand
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(0) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.5) rotateX(45deg) rotateY(45deg); opacity: 0.8; } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation zooms in with a 3D effect and expands from the center.

animations.name: rotateClockwise
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
animations.content: This is a clockwise rotation animation

animations.name: rotateCounterClockwise
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(-360deg); }
animations.content: This is a counterclockwise rotation animation

animations.name: rotatePendulum
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 25% { transform: rotate(30deg); } 50% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 75% { transform: rotate(-30deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation swings back and forth like a pendulum

animations.name: rotateZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation rotates while zooming in and out

animations.name: rotateBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) translateY(-10px); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation rotates while bouncing vertically

animations.name: rotateDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg) translateX(0) translateY(0); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) translateX(20px) translateY(-20px); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg) translateX(0) translateY(0); }
animations.content: This animation rotates while moving diagonally

animations.name: rotateElastic
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 40% { transform: rotate(360deg); } 60% { transform: rotate(300deg); } 80% { transform: rotate(330deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation rotates with an elastic effect

animations.name: rotateColorFade
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); background-color: red; } 25% { transform: rotate(90deg); background-color: blue; } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg); background-color: green; } 75% { transform: rotate(270deg); background-color: yellow; } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); background-color: red; }
animations.content: This animation rotates and cycles through background colors

animations.name: rotate3D
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); } 25% { transform: rotateX(90deg) rotateY(0deg); } 50% { transform: rotateX(90deg) rotateY(90deg); } 75% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(90deg); } 100% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation rotates in 3D space along both X and Y axes

animations.name: rotateTwist
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1); } 25% { transform: rotate(90deg) scale(1.5); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1); } 75% { transform: rotate(270deg) scale(1.5); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation rotates with a twist effect, scaling in and out

animations.name: rotateRipple
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } 25% { transform: rotate(90deg); opacity: 0.7; } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg); opacity: 0.4; } 75% { transform: rotate(270deg); opacity: 0.7; } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); opacity: 1; }
animations.content: This animation rotates while fading in and out, creating a ripple effect

animations.name: rotatePulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1); }
animations.content: This animation rotates while pulsing in size, creating a rhythmic effect

animations.name: rotateZigzag
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg) translateX(0); } 25% { transform: rotate(90deg) translateX(50px); } 50% { transform: rotate(180deg) translateX(-50px); } 75% { transform: rotate(270deg) translateX(50px); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg) translateX(0); }
animations.content: This animation rotates with a zigzag motion across the X-axis

animations.name: rotateSwing
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 25% { transform: rotate(15deg); } 50% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 75% { transform: rotate(-15deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation creates a swing-like motion, gently rotating back and forth

animations.name: rotateFlip
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0deg); } 50% { transform: rotateY(180deg); } 100% { transform: rotateY(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation flips the element back and forth like a card

animations.name: textGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { text-shadow: 0 0 5px #ff0000; } 50% { text-shadow: 0 0 20px #ff0000; } 100% { text-shadow: 0 0 5px #ff0000; }
animations.content: This is a glowing text animation

animations.name: textSlide
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: translateX(100%); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
animations.content: This is a sliding text animation

animations.name: textWave
animations.keyframes: 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-10px); }
animations.content: This creates a wave-like effect where the text moves up and down.

animations.name: textRainbow
animations.keyframes: 0% { color: red; } 20% { color: orange; } 40% { color: yellow; } 60% { color: green; } 80% { color: blue; } 100% { color: violet; }
animations.content: This animation cycles through a rainbow of colors for the text.

animations.name: textPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { font-size: 1em; } 50% { font-size: 1.5em; } 100% { font-size: 1em; }
animations.content: Increase Text Size

animations.name: textShadowSweep
animations.keyframes: 0% { text-shadow: -10px 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } 50% { text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,0,255,0.7); } 100% { text-shadow: 10px -10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); }
animations.content: This makes the text's shadow sweep around for a dynamic effect.

animations.name: flipX
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateX(0); } 100% { transform: rotateX(180deg); }
animations.content: This is a flip X animation

animations.name: flipY
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0); } 100% { transform: rotateY(180deg); }
animations.content: This is a flip Y animation

animations.name: flipDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate3d(1, 1, 0, 0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate3d(1, 1, 0, 180deg); }
animations.content: This animation flips diagonally across X and Y axes.

animations.name: flipZ
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateZ(0); } 100% { transform: rotateZ(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation flips the element on the Z-axis for a spinning effect.

animations.name: flipBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateX(0); } 50% { transform: rotateX(90deg); } 100% { transform: rotateX(0); }
animations.content: This animation flips along the X-axis with a bouncing effect.

animations.name: flipCube
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0); } 25% { transform: rotateY(90deg); } 50% { transform: rotateY(180deg); } 75% { transform: rotateY(270deg); } 100% { transform: rotateY(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation simulates a cube rotating along the Y-axis.

animations.name: flip3D
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotate3d(1, 1, 1, 0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate3d(1, 1, 1, 360deg); }
animations.content: This animation performs a 3D flip along all three axes.

animations.name: flipZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotateX(90deg); } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotateX(180deg); }
animations.content: This animation combines flipping on the X-axis with a zooming effect.

animations.name: flipGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.5); } 50% { transform: rotateY(90deg); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.9); } 100% { transform: rotateY(180deg); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.5); }
animations.content: This animation flips along the Y-axis with a glowing box-shadow effect.

animations.name: pulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This is a pulsing animation

animations.name: pulseFast
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.5); } 100% { transform: scale(1); }
animations.content: This is a fast pulsing animation

animations.name: pulseGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.5); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.9); } 100% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.5); }
animations.content: This pulsing animation includes a glowing effect.

animations.name: pulseColorShift
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); background-color: #3498db; } 50% { transform: scale(1.3); background-color: #e74c3c; } 100% { transform: scale(1); background-color: #3498db; }
animations.content: This animation changes the element's color while pulsing.

animations.name: pulseRotate
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) rotate(10deg); } 100% { transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation adds a slight rotation during the pulse.

animations.name: pulseDiagonal
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1) translate(0, 0); } 50% { transform: scale(1.2) translate(10px, -10px); } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate(0, 0); }
animations.content: This pulsing animation moves the element diagonally during the pulse.

animations.name: pulseBorderExpand
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); border-width: 2px; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); border-width: 8px; } 100% { transform: scale(1); border-width: 2px; }
animations.content: This animation expands the element's border while pulsing.

animations.name: pulseShadowSpread
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } 50% { transform: scale(1.3); box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } 100% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); }
animations.content: This animation makes the box shadow spread out while pulsing.

animations.name: pulseCircular
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: scale(1); border-radius: 0%; } 50% { transform: scale(1.2); border-radius: 50%; } 100% { transform: scale(1); border-radius: 0%; }
animations.content: This animation adds a circular effect during the pulse.

animations.name: borderGrowShrink
animations.keyframes: 0% { border: 2px solid transparent; } 50% { border: 10px solid yellow; } 100% { border: 2px solid transparent; }
animations.content: This animation grows and shrinks the border from transparent to a thicker yellow border

animations.name: borderBlink
animations.keyframes: 0% { border: none; } 50% { border: 2px solid red; } 100% { border: none; }
animations.content: This animation blinks the border from none to a red border and back

animations.name: borderSlideFromLeft
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-left: 0px solid red; } 50% { border-left: 8px solid red; } 100% { border-left: 0px solid red; }
animations.content: This animation draws a border from the left side of the element.

animations.name: borderSlideFromTop
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-top: none; } 100% { border-top: 5px solid blue; }
animations.content: This animation creates a border from the top side of the element.

animations.name: borderWave
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; } 25% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; } 50% { border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid blue; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; } 75% { border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid blue; border-left: 2px solid transparent; } 100% { border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid blue; }
animations.content: This animation creates a wave effect by sequentially adding borders to each side.

animations.name: borderColorShift
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid green; border-bottom: 5px solid blue; border-left: 5px solid yellow; } 50% { border-top: 5px solid purple; border-right: 5px solid cyan; border-bottom: 5px solid orange; border-left: 5px solid pink; } 100% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid green; border-bottom: 5px solid blue; border-left: 5px solid yellow; }
animations.content: This animation shifts the border colors in a smooth cycle, giving a dynamic, colorful effect.

animations.name: borderExpandPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { border: 2px solid transparent; } 50% { border: 10px solid purple; } 100% { border: 2px solid transparent; }
animations.content: This animation makes the border pulse, expanding and contracting in size while alternating colors.

animations.name: borderBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-top: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; } 25% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid transparent; border-bottom: 5px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent; } 50% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid red; border-bottom: 5px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent; } 75% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid red; border-bottom: 5px solid red; border-left: 5px solid transparent; } 100% { border-top: 5px solid red; border-right: 5px solid red; border-bottom: 5px solid red; border-left: 5px solid red; }
animations.content: This animation causes the border to bounce in by progressively appearing from each side.

animations.name: borderBoxShadowShake
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); } 50% { box-shadow: 10px 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); }
animations.content: This animation shakes the box-shadow, creating a dramatic shadow effect around the border.

animations.name: borderWaveWithRadius
animations.keyframes: 0% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; border-radius: 0; } 25% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid blue; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; border-radius: 10px; } 50% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid blue; border-bottom: 2px solid blue; border-left: 2px solid transparent; border-radius: 50%; } 75% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid blue; border-bottom: 2px solid blue; border-left: 2px solid blue; border-radius: 10px; } 100% { border-top: 2px solid blue; border-right: 2px solid transparent; border-bottom: 2px solid transparent; border-left: 2px solid transparent; border-radius: 0; }
animations.content: This animation waves the borders in a circular motion, while dynamically changing the border-radius to create a 3D effect.

animations.name: borderFlashWithGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { border: 2px solid yellow; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6); } 50% { border: 2px solid orange; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.8); } 100% { border: 2px solid yellow; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6); }
animations.content: This animation flashes the border while also applying a glowing effect to make it stand out.

animations.name: borderShadowDance
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px red; } 25% { box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px green; } 50% { box-shadow: -5px -5px 5px blue; } 75% { box-shadow: 5px -5px 5px yellow; } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 5px red; }
animations.content: This animation moves the box-shadow around the element, creating a dancing effect.

animations.name: perspectiveShift
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: perspective(800px); } 50% { transform: perspective(400px); } 100% { transform: perspective(800px); }
animations.content: This animation shifts the perspective, creating a 3D tilting effect.

animations.name: skewPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: skewX(0deg); } 50% { transform: skewX(20deg); } 100% { transform: skewX(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation creates a smooth pulsing skew effect along the X-axis.

animations.name: skewFlip
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: skewY(0deg); } 50% { transform: skewY(-20deg); } 100% { transform: skewY(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation flips the element slightly with a skew effect along the Y-axis.

animations.name: rotate3D
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); } 50% { transform: rotateX(180deg) rotateY(180deg); } 100% { transform: rotateX(360deg) rotateY(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation rotates the element smoothly in 3D space along both axes.

animations.name: skewSlide
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: skewX(0deg); } 50% { transform: skewX(-15deg) translateX(50%); } 100% { transform: skewX(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation slides the element while applying a skew effect.

animations.name: cubeSpin
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0deg); } 25% { transform: rotateY(90deg); } 50% { transform: rotateY(180deg); } 75% { transform: rotateY(270deg); } 100% { transform: rotateY(360deg); }
animations.content: This animation spins the element like a cube on the Y-axis.

animations.name: perspectiveZoom
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(0); } 50% { transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(200px); } 100% { transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(0); }
animations.content: This animation zooms the element in and out in 3D space using perspective.

animations.name: skewPop
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: skew(0deg, 0deg); } 25% { transform: skew(15deg, 15deg) scale(1.2); } 50% { transform: skew(-15deg, -15deg) scale(1.2); } 100% { transform: skew(0deg, 0deg); }
animations.content: This animation combines a skew effect with a pop-like scaling effect.

animations.name: tiltWave
animations.keyframes: 0%, 100% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); } 25% { transform: rotateX(10deg); } 50% { transform: rotateY(10deg); } 75% { transform: rotateX(-10deg); }
animations.content: This animation tilts the element in a smooth wave motion.

animations.name: skewGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: skewX(0deg); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,255,0); } 50% { transform: skewX(20deg); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,0,255,0.7); } 100% { transform: skewX(0deg); box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,255,0); }
animations.content: This animation adds a glowing effect to the element as it skews along the X-axis.

animations.name: flipSkewBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { transform: rotateY(0deg) skewX(0deg); } 50% { transform: rotateY(180deg) skewX(20deg); } 100% { transform: rotateY(360deg) skewX(0deg); }
animations.content: This animation combines a 3D flip with a skew effect and a bounce-like movement.

animations.name: boxShadowPulse
animations.content: This animation causes the box shadow to pulse, growing and shrinking like a glowing effect.

animations.name: boxShadowSwing
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: -10px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } 50% { box-shadow: 10px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } 100% { box-shadow: -10px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }
animations.content: This animation makes the box shadow swing side to side like it's moving back and forth.

animations.name: boxShadowExpand
animations.content: This animation makes the box shadow grow from the element's center, expanding outward for a glowing effect.

animations.name: boxShadowFlicker
animations.content: This animation flickers the box shadow in and out, creating a dynamic, light-flashing effect.

animations.name: boxShadowBounce
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } 50% { box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); }
animations.content: This animation makes the box shadow bounce vertically, creating the illusion that the element is bouncing.

animations.name: boxShadowColorChange
animations.content: This animation smoothly changes the color of the box shadow, creating a transition between different colors.

animations.name: boxShadowInset
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } 50% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); }
animations.content: This animation alternates between a normal and inset box shadow, creating a dynamic, inward and outward effect.

animations.name: boxShadowInsetGlow
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.3); } 50% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.7); } 100% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.3); }
animations.content: This animation makes the box shadow glow inward with a pulsating red effect, creating an atmospheric appearance.

animations.name: boxShadowInsetOscillation
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: inset 10px -10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } 50% { box-shadow: inset -10px 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); } 100% { box-shadow: inset 10px -10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }
animations.content: This animation oscillates the inset shadow diagonally, creating a dynamic, shifting light effect.

animations.name: singleInset
animations.keyframes: 0% { box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } 100% { box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }
animations.content: This animation oscillates the inset shadow diagonally, creating a dynamic, shifting light effect.

animations.name: backgroundPulse
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-color: #FF5733; } 50% { background-color: #C70039; } 100% { background-color: #FF5733; }
animations.content: This animation creates a pulsing background color effect

animations.name: backgroundColorChange
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-color: #3498db; } 100% { background-color: #2ecc71; }
animations.content: This animation gradually changes the background color

animations.name: backgroundBlur
animations.keyframes: 0% { filter: blur(0px); } 100% { filter: blur(5px); }
animations.content: This animation applies a blur effect to the background

animations.name: textureWave
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733 25%, #C70039 25%, #C70039 50%, #FF5733 50%, #FF5733 75%, #C70039 75%, #C70039 100%); background-size: 50px 50px; } 100% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733 25%, #C70039 25%, #C70039 50%, #FF5733 50%, #FF5733 75%, #C70039 75%, #C70039 100%); background-size: 100px 100px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a waving striped texture pattern

animations.name: stripedBackground
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733 25%, #C70039 25%, #C70039 50%, #FF5733 50%, #FF5733 75%, #C70039 75%, #C70039 100%); background-size: 50px 50px; } 100% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733 25%, #C70039 25%, #C70039 50%, #FF5733 50%, #FF5733 75%, #C70039 75%, #C70039 100%); background-size: 100px 100px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a waving striped texture pattern

animations.name: gradientShift
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #FF5733, #C70039); background-size: 200% 200%; } 100% { background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #FF5733, #C70039); background-size: 200% 200%; }
animations.content: This animation shifts a gradient texture across the background

animations.name: gridEffect
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(-45deg, #4CAF50 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: 50px 50px; } 100% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(-45deg, #4CAF50 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: 100px 100px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a grid texture with a pulsing effect

animations.name: noiseEffect
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,.1), rgba(0,0,0,.1) 1px, rgba(255,255,255,.2) 1px, rgba(255,255,255,.2) 2px); } 100% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,.1), rgba(0,0,0,.1) 1px, rgba(255,255,255,.2) 1px, rgba(255,255,255,.2) 2px); }
animations.content: This animation creates a noise-like effect using a repeating linear gradient

animations.name: diagonalLines
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733, #FF5733 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px); background-size: 40px 40px; } 100% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #FF5733, #FF5733 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px); background-size: 80px 80px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a dynamic diagonal line texture

animations.name: mosaicPattern
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #C70039, #C70039 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px), repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, #FF5733, #FF5733 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px); background-size: 20px 20px; } 100% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, #C70039, #C70039 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px), repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, #FF5733, #FF5733 10px, transparent 10px, transparent 20px); background-size: 40px 40px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a mosaic-like pattern with alternating colors

animations.name: bubblesEffect
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: radial-gradient(circle, #C70039 10%, transparent 20%), radial-gradient(circle, #FF5733 10%, transparent 20%); background-size: 20px 20px; } 100% { background-image: radial-gradient(circle, #C70039 10%, transparent 20%), radial-gradient(circle, #FF5733 10%, transparent 20%); background-size: 40px 40px; }
animations.content: This animation creates a floating bubble effect using radial gradients

animations.name: WaveEffect
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50 25%, #66BB6A 25%, #66BB6A 50%, #4CAF50 50%, #4CAF50 75%, #66BB6A 75%, #66BB6A 100%); background-size: 100% 100%; } 100% { background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50 25%, #66BB6A 25%, #66BB6A 50%, #4CAF50 50%, #4CAF50 75%, #66BB6A 75%, #66BB6A 100%); background-size: 100% 150%; }
animations.content: A wavy background pattern that animates in a rippling effect.

animations.name: MosaicFlipEffect
animations.keyframes: 0% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #4CAF50 50px, transparent 50px, transparent 100px); background-size: 100px 100px; } 100% { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #4CAF50, #4CAF50 50px, transparent 50px, transparent 100px); background-size: 200px 200px; }
animations.content: A flip effect applied to a mosaic pattern that dynamically adjusts its grid size.
